abstract: bridge over manchester ship canal is shut due to police incident .
article: greater manchester police say they 're concerned for the welfare of a man on the bridgea bridge over the manchester ship canal has been closed since the early hours of new year 's day due to a police incident . the barton road swing bridge has been shut since 3.30 am this morning . a gmp spokesman said the closure was due to ` a police incident and concern for the welfare of a man on the bridge ' . the bridge carries the b5211 over the canal , between barton upon irwell on the north bank and dumplington on the south bank .

anthony rowlandsfighting , spitting at police and drink-driving : how some celebrated the new year in manchesterpolice , ambulance teams , and fire crews are at the scene . greater manchester fire and rescue service also have a brigade inshore rescue boat . the bridge runs parallel to the barton swing aqueduct which carries the bridgewater canal . got a story or an issue you want us to investigate ? want to tell us about something going on where you live ? let us know - in complete confidence - by emailing newsdesk@men-news . co. uk , calling us on 0161 211 2323 , tweeting us @mennewsdesk or messaging us on our facebook page .
